# Crystal Release: Crystal Imprisonment Wave

## Quick Facts
- Element/Type: Crystal Release
- Classification: Kekkei Genkai~Crystal Release, Ninjutsu
- Class: Supplementary
- Users: Guren
- Media: Anime

## Summary
A technique similar to Guren's Crystal Release: Crystal Pentagonal Prison, where she instead sends a wave of pink crystal particles through the air to encase her target(s) in crystal.
